div.style: display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; position: relative
display: flex; margin-right: 5px; flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start

label.style: line-clamp: 1; text-stroke: 1px @Color_BG_L2; align-self: flex-start; font-size: 28px; color: @Color_Text_L1; line-height: 33px; position: relative; text-overflow: ellipsis; max-width: 168px; overflow: hidden

div.style: display: flex; line-height: 24px; background-color: @Color_Hue210_H1; border-radius: 17.5px; padding-left: 8px; padding-right: 8px; margin-top: 4px; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; position: relative

label.style: line-clamp: 1; text-stroke: 1px @Color_BG_L2; align-self: center; margin: 3px 8px; font-size: 24px; color: @Color_Text_Brand; text-overflow: ellipsis; max-width: 150px; overflow: hidden
